title: AzureActiveDirectoryGroupTemplate
description:
A base model class that provides additional helper methods and
configurations for other models used in IAMbic.

iambic_managed.description: Controls the directionality of Iambic changes

idp_name.title: Idpname
idp_name.description: Name of the identity provider that's associated with the resource

expires_at.title: Expiresat
expires_at.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Denotes whether the resource has been removed from AWS.Upon being set to true, the resource will be deleted the next time iambic is ran.

expires_at_default.title: Expiresatdefault
expires_at_default.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Properties for the Azure AD Group

Member.title: Member
Member.description:
A base model class that provides additional helper methods and
configurations for other models used in IAMbic.

expires_at.title: Expiresat
expires_at.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Denotes whether the resource has been removed from AWS.Upon being set to true, the resource will be deleted the next time iambic is ran.

expires_at_default.title: Expiresatdefault
expires_at_default.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique ID for the member. This value is imported by IAMbic, and doesn't need to be manually set.

GroupTemplateProperties.title: GroupTemplateProperties
GroupTemplateProperties.description:
A base model class that provides additional helper methods and
configurations for other models used in IAMbic.

expires_at.title: Expiresat
expires_at.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Denotes whether the resource has been removed from AWS.Upon being set to true, the resource will be deleted the next time iambic is ran.

expires_at_default.title: Expiresatdefault
expires_at_default.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

group_id.title: Groupid
group_id.description: Unique Group ID for the group. This value is imported by IAMbic, and doesn't need to be manually set.

group_types.title: Grouptypes
group_types.description: Specifies the group type and its membership.

is_assignable_to_role.title: Isassignabletorole
is_assignable_to_role.description: Indicates whether this group can be assigned to an Azure Active Directory role or not.

membership_rule.title: Membershiprule
membership_rule.description: The rule that determines members for this group if the group is a dynamic group.

members.title: Members
members.description: A list of users in the group

created_date_time.title: Createddatetime
created_date_time.description: Date and time when the group was created

creation_options.title: Creationoptions
creation_options.description: Specifies the group type and its membership

deleted_date_time.title: Deleteddatetime
deleted_date_time.description: Date and time when the group was deleted

expiration_date_time.title: Expirationdatetime
expiration_date_time.description: Date and time when the group expires

membership_rule_processing_state.title: Membershipruleprocessingstate
membership_rule_processing_state.description: Indicates whether the group is a dynamic group or not

preferred_data_location.title: Preferreddatalocation
preferred_data_location.description: Preferred data location of the group

renewed_date_time.title: Reneweddatetime
renewed_date_time.description: Date and time when the group was renewed

resource_behavior_options.title: Resourcebehavioroptions
resource_behavior_options.description: Resource behavior options of the group

resource_provisioning_options.title: Resourceprovisioningoptions
resource_provisioning_options.description: Resource provisioning options of the group
